entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A prefect and friend of Harry's.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who is known for being strict.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A magical school where Harry and his friends attend.

entities.name: golden egg
entities.description: An object that Harry is trying to solve a secret about.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: A magical item that allows the wearer to become invisible.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric are friends, as mentioned in the text.
Harry has had a negative experience with Filch before, which is why he wants to avoid him.
Harry attends Hogwarts as a student.
Harry is trying to solve the secret of the golden egg.
Harry owns and uses the Invisibility Cloak.
